page.title: 05School Services in Grampound
page.content: Grampound School is a church school which means that the Rector of the church comes into school every week to teach the fourth year juniors.He is at all the services we have in church.We go to the church in the village which is called St.Nun's.It is a small church but very pretty.We always go to church on Ascension Day. The service we enjoy the most is the one we hold at Christmas. Sometimes we have a Carol Service or a Christingle service.Some years we dress up and act out the Christmas story.One year we held up large cards to spell the word Christmas then talked about what each letter could stand for as regards Christmas activities and customs.At the end of every school year we have a special service to say goodbye to the children who are leaving the school.
